mapper.insert: insert into tbl_board (bno, title, content, writer) values (seq_board_bno.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.select:
select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select * from tbl_board
where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or content like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where writer like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
order by bno desc ) a ) where rnum >= #{startRow} and rnum <= #{endRow}
